name: Amphetamobile
description:
Amphetamobile, LLC is a Philadelphia area mobile development company that specializes in the delivery of scholarly information and education. We have expertise in strategic development, deep understanding of scholars and their unique needs and workflows, and the resources and technology to ensure successful implementation. Amphetamobile, or AMMO for short, provides web, mobile web, and native (iOS and Android) mobile application development, design, and consulting.
AMMO has developed mobile publishing platforms for periodical, textbook, image bank, and Q&A content, which are customized and developed in partnership with leading international publishers.
